help-file.title: "UNHOLY WORD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: Yes Duration: Dependent on effect and proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This evil spell affects only those of good alignment and can cause the following effects, dependent on the proficiency of the caster: kill, blindness, stun, or massive damage. If the caster is good, the spell can have nasty side effects.
